fields.name: Local authority
fields.description: Local authority responsible for the library service

fields.name: Library name
fields.description: Full public name by which the library is known. If the event is not held in a library use Outreach.

fields.name: Event date
fields.description: The date the event was held

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The name of the event.If an outreach event add the location in to this column.

fields.name: Main outcome
fields.description: The intended outcome from the event. One of a set of predefined outcomes.

enum: Helping everyone achieve their full potential

fields.name: Secondary outcome
fields.description: Optional secondary outcome from the event. One of a set of predefined outcomes.

enum: Helping everyone achieve their full potential

fields.name: Attendees
fields.description: The number of attendees in total.
